title: Bug 112458: Property Editor shows layout item properties instead of Master page viewer properties
description: The Property Editor continues to display the properties of layout items even when switching to the Master page viewer. Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a new report and insert a label. 2. Select the label. (The Property Editor displays the label's properties) 3.
OB: The Property Editor should display the properties of the Master page viewer when switching to it from a layout item.
EB: The Property Editor currently shows the properties of layout items instead of the properties of the Master page viewer when switching to it.
SR: Modify the Property Editor to correctly display the properties of the Master page viewer when switching to it from a layout item.
